system.description: Whenever you inflict a status effect on an enemy, put down an illusory clone (Size 1, 2 HP) of yourself on a tile adjacent to them. All enemies adjacent to an illusory clone suffer -1d to their Defenses. You can only have up to 3 Illusions at a time, and when you rush you can swap places with an illusion, teleporting.
